Plot: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.
Title: Super Troopers
Writer: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter, Erik Stolhanske
Actors: André Vippolis, Joey Kern, Geoffrey Arend, Erik Stolhanske
tomatoConsensus: A more-miss -than-hit affair, Super Troopers will most likely appeal to those looking for something silly.
